overview:
Atul leads execution for carbon advisory services in India, Africa and South East Asia. He is responsible for execution, contracting and new business development for the carbon advisory business.

Atul has of experience in Clean Development Mechanism (CDM) project development and has successfully registered more than 35 CDM projects. He also has facilitated registration of voluntary carbon market (VCM) projects. He has experience across various methodologies, project types and rules and procedures that govern the CDM project cycle.

Atul is a Mechanical Engineer and also has a Masters degree in Energy and Environment from the Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi.
